text: Bonif치cio Piccinini (13 May 1929 - 28 November 2020) was a Brazilian Roman Catholic archbishop. He became a priest in 1960. He was titular archbishop of Turres in Byzacena and as coadjutor archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Cuiab치 Brazil, from 1975 to 1981 and as archbishop of the archdiocese from 1981 to 2004. Piccinini died on 28 November 2020 at the age of 91.Archdiocese of Cuiab치 ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic archbishops Category:People from Mato Grosso
